_sText:
mg_spirals_course_v3
Info It's a remake of an old obstacle map I made a long time ago. It's kinda short but should be of fair difficulty for the average player.
  • File Size: 7mb (3mb zipped)
  • 52 Spawns (26 vs 26)
  • Lighting (Sun / Light_Env)
  • Optimized (Area Portals)
  • Effects (Fire / Sparks etc)
  • Custom Stuff
  • 7 "levels"
  • Radar
Made For: STEAMGAMERS.COM | MiniGames | *Funtastic* 72.26.196.164:27015
Changelog V1 Original Release V2 Tweaked level difficulty Increased Lava Scroll Speed Fixed a small bug Added RADAR V3 Fixed Radar Pakrat (>_>) Changed instant death areas to weak hurts, this means players get more chances and makes the map more enjoyable for everyone.
